title: 我用hmcl启动游戏，刚进去没多久就说AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
author: dmrmmrr
txt_content:
我用hmcl启动游戏，刚进去没多久就崩溃了



日志.txt
(127.69 KB, 下载次数: 7)



2020-2-19 10:01 上传
点击文件名下载附件





[09:53:46] [Client thread/INFO] [STDOUT]: [net.minecraft.init.Bootstrap:func_179870_a:553]: #@!@# Game crashed! Crash report saved to: #@!@# F:\MC\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2020-02-19_09.53.45-server.txt
[09:53:46] [Client thread/INFO] [FML]: Waiting for the server to terminate/save.
[09:53:47] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension 0
[09:53:47] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Applying holder lookups
[09:53:47] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Holder lookups applied
[09:53:47] [Server thread/INFO] [projecte]: Completed server-stop actions.
[09:53:47] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: The state engine was in incorrect state SERVER_STOPPING and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.
[09:53:47] [Client thread/INFO] [FML]: Server terminated.

replies.author: 翎澈Official
replies.txt_content:
dmrmmrr 发表于 2020-2-20 11:30
这就是我玩单机离线时崩溃后的日志啊！
刚才我玩又崩了，录下来的
删掉高清修复，重装一个Java试试看

replies.author: 翎澈Official
replies.txt_content: 你是不是在服务器里使用了中文世界名（文件夹的名字）

replies.txt_content:

你是不是在服务器里使用了中文世界名（文件夹的名字）
